mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_INFO( ACCOUNT_ID, OPEN_ID, BALANCE, CHANNEL, CHANNEL_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, CRT_DATE, CRT_TIME, USER_NAME ) VALUES( #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT ACCOUNT_ID, OPEN_ID, BALANCE, CHANNEL, CHANNEL_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, CRT_DATE, CRT_TIME, USER_NAME FROM ACCOUNT_INFO WHERE OPEN_ID = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CHANNEL = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
